description.narrative: A specific focus on linking Malian art scene to the international art scene through the use of e-learning
A specific focus on linking Malian art scene to the international art scene through the use of e-learning

title.narrative: Educational training for selected music students

description.narrative: High-level musicians studying at either CAMM or INA have been selected to participate in dedicated training in Denmark with the aim of empowering them to be change agents in Mali and to strengthen their artistic level plus securing them a way to record and publish their music. In order to ensure that the eslected artists are pro-peace and unity, a questionnaire with 4-5 simple questions on the peace process and their sentiments towards reconciliation will be used at the very beginning and continuously throughout the project to measure the development of the young people participating in the programme. Hopefully we would see an increase in their believe in peace and reconciliation as the programme moves on.

title.narrative: Educational training for selected music students

description.narrative: High-level musicians studying at either CAMM or INA have been selected to participate in dedicated training in Denmark with the aim of empowering them to be change agents in Mali and to strengthen their artistic level plus securing them a way to record and publish their music. In order to ensure that the eslected artists are pro-peace and unity, a questionnaire with 4-5 simple questions on the peace process and their sentiments towards reconciliation will be used at the very beginning and continuously throughout the project to measure the development of the young people participating in the programme. Hopefully we would see an increase in their believe in peace and reconciliation as the programme moves on.

title.narrative: Young artists – musicians and music educators have contributed to promotion of peaceful co-existence between different groups and communities in Mali

description.narrative: The number of young artists and their audiences has increased and the number of artists who have been empowered and educated and given tools to create a sustainable livelihood as artists, thereby creating a more sustainable situation for the Mali art scene.

title.narrative: Young artists – musicians and music educators have contributed to promotion of peaceful co-existence between different groups and communities in Mali

description.narrative: The number of young artists and their audiences has increased and the number of artists who have been empowered and educated and given tools to create a sustainable livelihood as artists, thereby creating a more sustainable situation for the Mali art scene.

title.narrative: Capacity building of art educational institutions

description.narrative: The two main cooperation partners CAMM and INA have been strengthened in their capacity to be the highest level art educational institutions, compared to the West African context including methodologies in training on peace building and reconciliation through film making.

title.narrative: Capacity building of art educational institutions

description.narrative: The two main cooperation partners CAMM and INA have been strengthened in their capacity to be the highest level art educational institutions, compared to the West African context including methodologies in training on peace building and reconciliation through film making.

title.narrative: SPOT on Mali music festivals - ARTISTS

description.narrative: Three festivals have been carried through succesfully with national media attention and with a high number of Malian artists, large and diverse audiences and with a corresponding visibility internationally through web, social media and flow TV

title.narrative: SPOT on Mali music festivals - ARTISTS

description.narrative: Three festivals have been carried through succesfully with national media attention and with a high number of Malian artists, large and diverse audiences and with a corresponding visibility internationally through web, social media and flow TV

title.narrative: SPOT on Mali music festivals - AUDIENCE

description.narrative:
Three festivals have been carried through succesfully with national media attention and with a high number of Malian artists, large and diverse audiences and with a corresponding visibility internationally through web, social media and flow TV
This output indicator focuses on the number of audiences attending the festival
